check.name: ResourceTitlePresent
check.description: Checks to see if at least one Resource Title concept exists.
check.code:
def call(): global output global status
output = "The concept ResourceTitle is present."
if(ResourceTitle is not None and len(ResourceTitle) > 0): status = "SUCCESS" return True
status = "FAILURE" output = "ResourceTitle concept is not present"
return False

selector.name: DistributionContact
selector.xpath: (/mdb:MD_Metadata/mdb:distributionInfo/mrd:MD_Distribution/mrd:distributor/mrd:MD_Distributor/mrd:distributorContact/cit:CI_Responsibility) | (/serf:SERF/serf:Service_Provider) | (/*/ecs:ArchiveCenter) | (/dct:contactPoint) | (/*/gmd:distributionInfo/gmd:MD_Distribution/gmd:distributor/gmd:MD_Distributor/gmd:distributorContact/gmd:CI_ResponsibleParty) | (//gmd:distributorContact/gmd:CI_ResponsibleParty) | (/*/echo:ArchiveCenter) | (/*/Contacts/Contact[contains(Role,'Data Manager')]) | (/*/Contacts/Contact[contains(Role,'DATA CENTER CONTACT')]) | (/*/Contacts/Contact[contains(Role,'Archive')]) | (/*/Contacts/Contact[contains(Role,'Distributor')]) | (/*/Contacts/Contact[contains(Role,'GHRC USER SERVICES')]) | (/*/Contacts/Contact[contains(Role,'User Services')]) | (/dif:DIF/dif:Data_Center/dif:Personnel/dif:Role) | (/bdp:metadata/bdp:distinfo/bdp:distrib/bdp:cntinfo) | (/eml:eml/*/associatedParty/role[RoleType='distributor']) | (/dif:DIF/dif:Data_Center/dif:Personnel/dif:Role) | (/mercury:metadata/mercury:distinfo/mercury:distrib/mercury:cntinfo) | (/mercury:metadata/mercury:mercury/mercury:Contact_Person) | (/mercury:metadata/mercury:distinfo/mercury:distrib/mercury:cntinfo/mercury:cntperp/mercury:cntper) | (/csdgm:metadata/csdgm:distinfo/csdgm:distrib/csdgm:cntinfo)
